item.title: 中国 2 月份采购经理人指数从 1 月份的 49.2 降至 49.1，其中产出部分大幅下降。该指数低于区分增长与萎缩的 50 分界线，与路透社调查的预测中值 49.1 一致。更多信息
item.description:
China's PMI fell to 49.1 in February from 49.2 in January with a sizeable drop in the output component. It was below the 50-mark separating growth from contraction and in line with a median forecast of 49.1 in a Reuters poll. Read more: https://t.co/89aMQFRQxW pic.twitter.com/eOVuYbN9F4

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 白宫表示，美国正在对中国汽车进口是否构成国家安全风险展开调查，并可能因对 "互联 "汽车技术的担忧而实施限制。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The United States is opening an investigation into whether Chinese vehicle imports pose national security risks and could impose restrictions due to concerns about ‘connected’ car technology, the White House said. More here: https://t.co/pts7s3V1hF

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 独家报道：德意志银行正准备在香港对中国开发商世茂集团提起清算诉讼，这是在信贷违约上升和中国房地产行业危机加深的背景下，一家外国公司采取的罕见举措。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Exclusive: Deutsche Bank is preparing a liquidation lawsuit in Hong Kong against Chinese developer Shimao Group, in a rare move by a foreign firm that comes amid rising credit defaults and China's deepening property sector crisis. More here: https://t.co/BlMYrNhZx3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 瑞士央行表示，瑞士国家银行行长托马斯-乔丹（Thomas Jordan）将于 9 月底卸任。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 一项官方调查显示，中国 2 月份制造业活动连续第五个月萎缩，这增加了中国政府在议会准备下周召开关键年会之际推出更多刺激措施的压力。更多信息
item.description:
China's manufacturing activity in February shrank for a fifth straight month, an official survey showed, raising pressure on Beijing to roll out more stimulus measures as the parliament prepares for a key annual meeting next week. Read more: https://t.co/89aMQFSonu pic.twitter.com/W695FMt6yr

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 预计中国国会将在周二开始的年度会议上公布温和的刺激计划，以稳定经济增长，但这可能会让那些要求制定详细的大胆政策路线图以解决中国深层次结构失衡问题的人失望。
item.description:
China's parliament is expected to unveil moderate stimulus plans to stabilize growth at an annual meeting beginning on Tuesday, but may disappoint those calling for a detailed roadmap of bold policies to fix the country's deep structural imbalances https://t.co/agomNszNvo

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 独家报道消息称德意志银行将对中国开发商世茂提起清算诉讼

Exclusive: Deutsche Bank to file liquidation suit against Chinese developer Shimao, sources say https://t.co/Bkc4AZa0Qm pic.twitter.com/YOzbeSQ11G

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 英国的春季预算将于下周三公布，届时将举行今年的大选，投资者热切期待看到财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）能否在赠款和增长计划与高额公共债务和高于目标的通胀率之间取得平衡。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Britain's Spring budget is due next Wednesday ahead of an election expected this year, and investors are keen to see if finance minister Jeremy Hunt can balance giveaways and growth schemes with high public debt and above-target inflation. More here: https://t.co/ihLj2CWIWq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 由于与人工智能相关的公司股价上涨以及通胀数据符合预期，S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数创下收盘新高。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq finished at record closing highs as stocks got a lift from shares of companies related to artificial intelligence and inflation data that met forecasts. More here: https://t.co/I8Y7SCE5T8 pic.twitter.com/DCHyvss7lM

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 通宵会谈后，世贸组织发布新的贸易协定草案，一些问题仍未解决
item.description:
WTO issues new draft trade deals after all-night talks, some issues unresolved https://t.co/c50WVfmBwm pic.twitter.com/VL2fpRnqXP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: Meta 将停止为 Facebook 上出现的内容向澳大利亚新闻出版商支付费用，从而与堪培拉展开新一轮较量。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Meta it will stop paying Australian news publishers for content that appears on Facebook, setting up a fresh battle with Canberra which had led the world with a law that forces internet giants to strike licensing deals. More here: https://t.co/RNgO7j1u8k

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 特斯拉推出了包括保险补贴在内的新激励措施，以吸引中国这一全球最大汽车市场的消费者，这家美国电动汽车巨头正在中国与比亚迪等根深蒂固的竞争对手展开旷日持久的价格战。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
Tesla unveiled new incentives, including insurance subsidies, to woo consumers in China, the world's largest auto market, where the US electric vehicle giant is in a protracted price war against entrenched rivals such as BYD. More here: https://t.co/dgXFJvGXCj

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 库博公司因隐形眼镜需求强劲而上调年度收入预期

Cooper Companies lifts annual revenue forecast on strong contact lens demand https://t.co/PV2a4LTd2Y pic.twitter.com/pwxmzSQrFY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 越南执政党共产党在准备扩大工人权利时指示官员控制工会，同时密切监视外国组织和出国旅行的公民。
item.description:
Vietnam's ruling Communist Party has directed officials to control trade unions as the country prepares to expand workers' rights, alongside closely monitoring foreign organizations and citizens travelling abroad, according to an advocacy group https://t.co/pWWinyRc0u pic.twitter.com/P8Y65gViUK

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 2 月份，亚洲主要制造业经济体努力摆脱衰退，日本尤其受到需求急剧下降的挤压，而中国不均衡的复苏则掩盖了该地区其他国家的一些改善迹象。
item.description:
Asia's major manufacturing economies struggled to claw their way out of decline in February with Japan particularly squeezed by a steeper fall in demand while an uneven recovery in China overshadowed some signs of improvement elsewhere in the region https://t.co/XAL5Zn0zi5

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024
